SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYCHECK
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: This calls all the Eligibility checks
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYCHECK ( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to check eligibilty @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier, -- Used to specify change agent for ChangedByID and AddedByID fields @deletedRows int = 0 output, -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were deleted @insertedRows int = 0 output) -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were inserted
as begin -- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
begin try exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDBIOCREATED @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDBIOPROOFREAD @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDBIOUPDATED @childIDList, @changeAgentID -- Removed for new photo process 12-9-13 / Added back per Pamela on 12/31/13 exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDPHOTOSTORED @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDCURRENTPHOTOINCRM @childIDList, @changeAgentID -- Removed for new photo process 12-9-13 -- exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDPHOTOUPDATED @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDPROFILEPHOTOUPDATED @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_PROFILEPHOTOYEARISBLANK @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_CHANGECURRENTPHOTOATTACHMENT @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_CURRENTPHOTOYEARDOESNOTMATCHHEADSHOT @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_CURRENTPHOTOYEARDOESNOTMATCHFULLBODY @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_CURRENTPHOTOATTACHMENTSDIFFERENTYEARS @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_MULTIPLECURRENTHEADSHOTATTACHMENTS @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_MULTIPLECURRENTFULLBODYATTACHMENTS @childIDList, @changeAgentID
exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_CHILDAGE @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_COMPLETIONDATE @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_PROJECTPENDING @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_PROJECTPHASINGOUT @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_PROJECTCLOSED @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEWCHILDVERIFICATION @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_REQUESTINGINFO @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_REQUESTINGINFONEWCHILD @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_BANGLADESHCONTACTABLECHILD @childIDList, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_TERMINATEHOLD @childIDList, @changeAgentID
exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILDREN_SETFUNDING @childIDList, @changeAgentID
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch end
